servicesCarousel.heading: What We Do
servicesCarousel.description: You bring the idea, we take it to deployment, delivering end-to-end vision intelligence services including front- and back-end integration, comprehensive data labeling, model training and optimization, and production-ready portals built for online deployment and revenue generation.

items.title: Computer Vision
items.description: Advanced AI-powered visual recognition and analysis systems for intelligent automation.

items.title: Model Training and Optimization
items.description: Our team leverages state-of-the-art computer vision models and training techniques to optimize accuracy, latency, and scalability based on your operational requirements.

items.title: Labeling
items.description: We provide an industry-leading labeling platform paired with expert human labeling services that deliver high-quality training data quickly and cost-effectively.

items.title: Full-Stack Development & Integration
items.description: We design and build intuitive user interfaces and robust front- and back-end systems, seamlessly integrating your computer vision solution into production-ready applications and workflows.

items.title: AI-Powered Workflow Orchestration
items.description: Our AI agents orchestrate complex workflows, choosing the right models for your data and resource needs to improve speed, accuracy, and efficiency.

items.title: Platform Development Services
items.description: We design and build scalable, production-ready platforms that bring AI and vision solutions to life, handling architecture, integration, and deployment so your product is ready for real users and revenue.

assets.title: One platform for vision intelligence and beyond.

items.name: VisionForge
items.tagline: Where vision intelligence becomes scalable AI.
items.description: One stop shop for industry-leading AI-based labeling, model training and optimization platform for individuals as well as teams.
features: Intuitive labeling tool with embedded VLM
Various choices of base models for training and optimization

items.name: D2B
items.tagline: Platform to connect clients and drone pilots.
items.description: A marketplace for clients and pilots to be paired to unlock the benefits of diverse applicability for drone services.
features: For Clients: Pilot profiles and discovery, pilot selection, quote management, mission updates, deliverables and payment handling
For Pilots: Quote pricing and analysis, resource and equipment management, mission planning, flight logging, deliverables and payment handling

finalCta.heading: Ready to redefine your digital trajectory?
